SEARCH
Package com.internship.system.data

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
com.internship.system.data.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
Central data management class for the internship system. Handles loading, saving, and querying of all entities (users, internships, applications). Maintains in-memory caches with ID-based lookups for efficient access.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new DataManager and initializes file paths.

  • Constructor Details

    • DataManager

      public DataManager()
      Constructs a new DataManager and initializes file paths. Files are expected to be in the current working directory.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllData

      public void loadAllData()
      Loads all data from CSV files into memory. Clears existing caches, loads all entities, builds ID maps, and reconciles confirmed offers.

    • saveAllData

      public void saveAllData()
      Saves all in-memory data to CSV files. Writes students, staff, company representatives, internships, and applications.

    • getStudents

      public List<Student> getStudents()
      Gets all students.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of all students

      Returns:
